drop_multispace: Replace sequences of multiple spaces in the rows i.e. "Foo    Bar" > "Foo Bar"
drop_punctuation: Remove punctuation characters !"#$%&'|()*+,-./:;<=>?@[]^_`{|}~ from the text. i.e. "foo." > "foo"
stopwords: Remove a user-defined stop words from rows by entering a comma-separated string of stop words below
nltk_stopwords: Remove stop words based on NLTK library
drop_numbers: Remove numbers from the content. i.e. "Foo123" > "Foo"
keep_alpha: Remove characters which are not part of the standard alphabet or spaces. i.e. "BÀr. @123 foo" > "BÀrfoo"
normalize_accents: Normalize accent characters with normal characters i.e. "BÀr foö" > "BAr foo'"
drop_all_space: Remove all spaces in the row i.e. "New York" > "NewYork"
add_word_number_space: Add space between words and/or numbers. i.e. "Berlin123" > "Berlin 123"
drop_repeated_chars: Removes characters which are repeated within a value i.e. "BBerlin" > "Berlin"
hidden_chars: Removes characters that cannot be printed to your screen using string.printable
replace_hyphen_w_space: Replaces any hyphens (unicode or otherwise) with a space
